CSSViewTransitionRule.summary: The CSSViewTransitionRule interface represents a CSS @view-transition at-rule.

CSSViewTransitionRuleNavigation.summary: The navigation read-only property of the interface returns the associated {{cssxref("@view-transition")}} at-rule's navigation descriptor value.
CSSViewTransitionRuleNavigation.value: A string.If no navigation descriptor is set on the _view-transition at-rule, the navigation property is equal to an empty string.

CSSViewTransitionRuleTypes.summary: The types read-only property of the interface returns an array containing the associated {{cssxref("@view-transition")}} at-rule's types descriptor values.
CSSViewTransitionRuleTypes.value: An array of strings.If no types descriptor is set on the _view-transition at-rule, the types property is equal to an empty array.
